Package vistra.app.control.state

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAnimation
    An interface for an animation handler: handles the animated iteration over a traversal-object.
    IControlContext
    An interface for a control context: handles off and idle.
    IParameterStateHandler
    An interface for a parameter handler: handles a graph and an algorithm as parameter for generating a traversal-object.
    IStepByStep
    An interface for a step-by-step handler: handles the step-by-step iteration over a traversal-object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAnimationState
    An abstract animation state.
    AbstractParameterState
    An abstract parameter state.
    AbstractSbsState
    An abstract step-by-step state.
    AnimationOff
    An animation state: off.
    AnimationPaused
    An animation state: paused.
    AnimationPlaying
    An animation state: playing.
    AnimationStateHandler
    An animation handler: handles the animated iteration over a traversal-object.
    AnimationStopped
    An animation state: stopped.
    ParameterAlgorithmSelected
    A parameter state: algorithm selected.
    ParameterGraphEdited
    A parameter state: graph edited.
    ParameterGraphSaved
    A parameter state: graph saved.
    ParameterOff
    A parameter state: off.
    ParameterStateHandler
    A parameter handler: handles a graph and an algorithm as parameter for generating a traversal-object.
    SbsAtBeginning
    A step-by-step state: at the beginning.
    SbsAtEnd
    A step-by-step state: at the end.
    SbsInter
    A step-by-step state: inter (... neither beginning nor end).
    SbsOff
    A step-by-step state: off.
    SbsStateHandler
    A step-by-step handler: handles the step-by-step iteration over a traversal-object.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AnimationStateHandler.AnimationEvent
    Animation events.
    ParameterStateHandler.ParameterEvent
    Parameter events.
    SbsStateHandler.SbsEvent
    Step-by-step events.
